channel.title: 508 server help?
channel.description: Hey guys, its me again. I got some problems in coding my friend server. Admin+ can't drop so its possible for other players to see what i dropped.. and admin+, can't trade either, how do i change so its possible for owners to trade and drop things to other peoples? Please reply :)

item.title: 508 server help?

item.description:

Hey guys, its me again.
I got some problems in coding my friend server.

and admin+, can’t trade either,
